Protocol","details":"This contract handles position management, token swapping, and collateral operations The Position contract represents a user's lending position in the Senja protocol. It manages collateral assets, borrow assets, and provides functionality for: - Withdrawing collateral - Swapping tokens within the position - Repaying loans with selected tokens - Calculating token values and exchange rates Key features: - Reentrancy protection for secure operations - Dynamic token list management - Price oracle integration for accurate valuations - Restricted access control (only lending pool can call certain functions)","errors":{"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}],"SafeERC20FailedOperation(address)":[{"details":"An operation with an ERC-20 token failed."}]},"events":{"Liquidate(address)":{"params":{"user":"The address of the user whose position was liquidated"}},"SwapToken(address,address,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"The amount of tokens being swapped","token":"The address of the token being swapped","user":"The address of the user performing of the input token","tokenOut":"The address of the output token","user":"The address of the user initiating the swap"}},"WithdrawCollateral(address,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"The amount of received","_tokenIn":"The address of the input token","_tokenOut":"The address of the output token"},"returns":{"amountOut":"The amount of output tokens _tokenCalculator(address,address,uint256.details: Uses PriceFeedIOracle price feeds to determine exchange ratesHandles different token decimals automatically

params._tokenIn: The address of the input token
params._tokenOut: The address of the output token

constructor.details: Sets up the initial position with collateral and borrow assets

params._lpAddress: The address of the lending pool
params._user: The address of the user who owns this position

repayWithSelectedToken(address,uint256,u.details: Only authorized contracts can call this functionIf the selected token is not the borrow asset, it will be swapped firstAny excess tokens after repayment are swapped back to the original token

params._amountOutMinimum: The minimum amount of output tokens received
params._token: The address of the token to use for repayment

swapTokenByPosition(address,address,uint.details: Only the position owner can call this functionUses DEX router for token swapping with slippage protection

params._amountIn: The amount of input tokens to swap
params._amountOutMinimum: The minimum amount of output tokens received
params._tokenIn: The address of the input token
params._tokenOut: The address of the output token

returns.amountOut: The amount of output tokens received

withdrawCollateral(uint256,address).details: Only authorized contracts can call this functionTransfers collateral tokens to the specified user

params._user: The address of the user to receive the collateral
params.amount: The amount of collateral to withdraw

_tokenCalculator(address,address,uint256.notice: Calculates the output amount for a token swap based on price feeds

constructor.notice: Constructor to initialize a new position

repayWithSelectedToken(address,uint256,u.notice: Repays a loan using a selected token

swapTokenByPosition(address,address,uint.notice: Swaps tokens within the position using DEX

tokenLists(uint256).notice: Mapping from token ID to token address

tokenListsId(address).notice: Mapping from token address to token ID
